name: SCNHitTestResult
desc: Information about the result of a scene-space or view-space search for scene elements.

items.name: var node: SCNNode
items.desc: The node whose geometry intersects the search ray.

items.name: var geometryIndex: Int
items.desc: The index of the geometry element whose surface the search ray intersects.

items.name: var faceIndex: Int
items.desc: The index of the primitive in the geometry element intersected by the search ray.

items.name: var localCoordinates: SCNVector3
items.desc: The point of intersection between the geometry and the search ray, in the local coordinate system of the node containing the geometry.

items.name: var worldCoordinates: SCNVector3
items.desc: The point of intersection between the geometry and the search ray, in the scene’s world coordinate system.

items.name: var localNormal: SCNVector3
items.desc: The surface normal vector at the point of intersection, in the local coordinate system of the node containing the geometry intersected by the search ray.

items.name: var worldNormal: SCNVector3
items.desc: The surface normal vector at the point of intersection, in the scene’s world coordinate system.

items.name: var modelTransform: SCNMatrix4
items.desc: The world transform matrix of the node containing the intersection.

items.name: func textureCoordinates(withMappingChannel: Int) -> CGPoint
items.desc: Returns the texture coordinates at the point of intersection for the specified texture mapping channel.
